r.d: This extension uses libgearman library to provide API for communicating with gearmand, and writing clients and workers.
r.n: - Fixed PECL Bug #18658 (GearmanWorker::wait and GearmanWorker::work are spamming the log with warnings.) - Fixed PECL Bug #22636 (Uncaught worker exception sends back GEARMAN_SUCCESS return code) - Fixed PECL Bug #16900 (Don't use reseved method names) - Fixed PECL Bug #59944 (Undefined symbol: gearman_client_set_server_option) - Now requires libgearman 0.21 or greater
